author: Flo
content:
Andreas, thank you very much for this visual treat! A "meal" for the eyes - a banquet, perhaps. How fortunate you are to live so close to such beauty. Where I live, a car is necessary to get away from look-alike houses and shopping malls and warehouses, and interstate highways that are constantly noisy.

The sun has turned - Yay! ðŸ™‚
